performances.description: The first and arguably the best of the 4 times they played it. The shock and awe of being in the arena that night was truly amazing, such a fun tune.

performances.venue: Buckeye Lake Music Center Hebron, OH
performances.description: Nicely played first set surprise, and the second set has an amazing Crazy Fingers, fun show.
A great 70's Reuben & Cherise, seems to beat the later versions.
Baller Jerry track that made the jump to the big leagues.  They lock in nicely to this version
NICE WAY TO END THE 1ST SET!!!!
Similar feel to the GD versions with more Jerry power but maybe less overall band fullness.  Epic Show.
This a JGB version. This one always gets me emotional. One of the best R&Cs ever performed. Jerry’s voice!

performances.venue: Keystone Palo Alto Palo Alto, CA
performances.description: Nice funky R&C. Also happens to be the last JGB show w/ Keith & Donna. Love Jer’s vox(especially “I’ve been afraid and I don’t know why I do). Heady!
